attributes.action: not introduce sex education lessons for 5 to 10 years olds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government insist that exposure to sex before puberty will lower the rate of teenage pregnancy.  Children want to be like their parents and copy us in everyway, surely all it will do is encourage them to try things, than put them off.  Childhood is precious and it is upto us as parents to introduce "adult" themes when we feel they are ready NOT when the Government say so
